page.title: 14SCHOOL AS IT IS TODAY.
page.content: {The classrooms}are 3 wooden huts.There are 38 lockers and 28 pupils in our class. The classrooms are a bit cramped. There are about 90 children in the whole school. The tables are grouped in 2's,4's and 6's. {From the fence}of the school playing- field I can see 8 different buildings. Three classrooms,the school hall, the caretakers house, the pottery shed, 1 garden shed and 2 houses. { {From the lawn}I can see 12 chimneys and a weather vane on the roofs.The school is in a pleasant spot with a playing-field, a tarmac covered play- ground, a lawn with a picnic table, a caretakers garden and flower border. We have 2 cooks and 2 dinner ladies. {I enjoyed}this school because it has a happy atmosphere.
